review: Incredible. Wish we had it sooner. If you watch a lot of Netflix or Amazon Prime movies & tv shows, then this is the solution/ best gift ever. All you do is plug it into your tv and the super easy remote (speak "Hobbit" and presto - it's there!) gives you all the movies right there on your tv. We cancelled our cable a year ago and never missed it -hooking our laptop up to the tv whenever we wanted to see stuff on the big screen - but we should have just grabbed this instead. It's just like having cable back again, without the insane monthly prices AND - and this is super nice - NO MORE COMMERCIALS!!! Yaaay! We were at a hotel last week and the programming was so offensive and there were so many commercials that we seriously wished we'd just brought our Amazon Fire TV box (it's a mini-box, really) with us - would have made our stay a lot nicer.Basics: just like your laptop or tablet needs wifi or an ethernet plug-in to play movies, tv shows and youtube videos, so does the Amazon Fire TV box. But intstead of the movies playing on the box, they play on your tv instead. Simple as that. Wham. Bam. Superior. Sweet. Far easier installation and ease of use than we realized. It may seem super hi-tech, but it's just so intuitive and simple that it doesn't come off this way. AWESOME present for anyone who loves Amazon Instant Videos, Netflix, Hulu, etc...
author: TCampbell "TCampbell"

Free two-day shipping is just icing on the cake!
